pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Chained Difference-in-Differences // Extends the 'did' package to improve efficiency and handling of unbalanced panel data. Bellego, Benatia, and Dortet-Bernadet (2024), "The Chained Difference-in-Differences", Journal of Econometrics, doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2024.105783.
